short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have the checkin page look for turnstile events and send post request to turnstile

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have the checkin page look for turnstile events and send unlock request to turnstile.

This extension works with Daxko Operations to open an IP connected turnstile.  This is not endorsed by Daxko in any way, it just works with their service.
